name: Martians in Manhattan! (GMTKJam)
description:
Small arcade game.  Dash and punch to defend Manhattan from the Martian invaders.

Try for a high score or combo!

Controls:

  • WSAD or arrow keys to move.
  • Left click to punch.
  • Right click to dash.
  • You get one midair dash.  Recharge it by landing or killing baddies.
  • Alt+Enter for fullscreen (highly recommended).
  • Esc to quit.

Programming, design,  art, and sound by Jackson Allen (@Jackson_T_Allen)

Made in 48 hours for the first  Game Maker's Toolkit Jam.  Theme: Downwell's Dual Purpose Design.

Font: Coder's Crux by NALGames  http://www.dafont.com/coders-crux.font

Music was made before the jam.  Gameboy Ghastliness by Airborne Alchemist.

Made in Game Maker Studio.

Sound Effects made in Bfxr.
